name: privacy-policy
text:
Privacy Policy for Bellingham Rental Reviews

Effective Date:August 22, 2024

Information We Collect

We value your privacy and want to be clear that we do not collect any personal data from you directly. The only data we collect is through Cloudflare Analytics, which helps us understand how visitors interact with our Site. This data is anonymized and does not include personal information such as your name, email address, or IP address.

Use of Collected Information

The anonymized data collected via Cloudflare Analytics is used solely for the purpose of improving our website and ensuring it operates efficiently. We do not use this data to identify or track individual users.

Data Sharing

We do not share any personal data with third parties, as we do not collect any personal data. The data collected by Cloudflare Analytics is handled according to Cloudflare's privacy policies, which you can review here.

Your Privacy Rights

Since we do not collect personal information, there are no additional privacy rights to manage or address. However, if you have any questions or concerns about your privacy or our privacy practices, we encourage you to reach out to us.

Contact Us

If you have any privacy-related questions or concerns, please contact us at:

Email: hello@bhamrentalreviews.com

This Privacy Policy may be updated from time to time, and any changes will be posted on this page. Please check back periodically to stay informed about how we are protecting your privacy.

Thank you for visiting Bellingham Rental Reviews.
